title: Chicken curry with a Scottish twist
ingredients: ['70ml ghee (or vegetable oil)', '2 chicken breasts', '2 onions, sliced', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '5 garlic cloves, minced', '25g root ginger root (ginger paste also works)', '300ml tinned tomatoes', 'salt', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '2 green chillies, chopped', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '4 teaspoons curry powder', '100g haggis (if desired)']
